subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: After his victory over Kyrgios — already a lightning rod for controversy in his young career — Murray discussed his own maturation process and the lessons he had learned about navigating the news media.
snippet: After his victory over Kyrgios — already a lightning rod for controversy in his young career — Murray discussed his own maturation process and the lessons he had learned about navigating the news media.
